code:
classDiagram
    class Subject {
        <<interface>>
        +attach(Observer)
        +detach(Observer)
        +notify()
    }
    class Observer {
        <<interface>>
        +update(Subject)
    }
    class ConcreteSubject {
        -List~Observer~ observers
        -Object state
        +attach(Observer)
        +detach(Observer)
        +notify()
        +getState() Object
        +setState(Object)
    }
    class ConcreteObserver {
        -ConcreteSubject subject
        +update(Subject)
    }
    Subject <|.. ConcreteSubject
    Observer <|.. ConcreteObserver
    ConcreteSubject o-- Observer : notifies
    ConcreteObserver --> ConcreteSubject : observes
repo_description: Type-safe Mermaid-compatible diagrams powered by TypeScript, Zod, and modern renderers.
